linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: "Jessica's Life: The Beginning" 4K Images Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 onwards
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon®
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU capable of showing images
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 onwards
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon®
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU capable of showing images
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
